prohibited-desc: List of Some Products which we are not bringing or are prohibited from bringing
how-h4: There is two types of ordering.
order-description-1: 1. You can add our Turkey adress to online shopping markets which you want to order.
order-description-2: 2. You can send us the link of the product which Size, Color and e.t.c you want we are accumulating and saying amount of money with Georgian Lari. After you paid the money to our Bank of Georgia account we are completing the order.
about: Meta Group 2022 is a company that brings the parcels and products from Turkey to Georgia. As the name of the company suggests, it was founded by Idris Elnuroglu in 2022 and has gained the trust and love of hundreds of people in a very short time. The main goal of the company's creation is to easily buy from online stores in Turkey or deliver parcels sent by individuals to Georgia in a fast and reliable manner
Pompalanan gaz CO balonu ve aksesuarları: Any type of ammunition and equipment.
Gazlı tüfekler - elektrikli pnömatik, he: Products requiring special storage and transportation, as well as chemicals.
Arbalet, oklar, yay: You must contact us and clarify any product that you are not sure about whether it is prohibited to bring it.
